text: Ecyrus ciliatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Chemsak and Linsley in 1975. It is known from Mexico.BioLib.cz - Ecyrus ciliatus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1975
title: Ecyrus ciliatus
